description.zh-CN: 专业工业控制系统界面，包含服务器集群监控、实时事件日志、手动控制面板和KPI统计。深色网格背景搭配橙色强调，营造高科技工业氛围。
description.en-US: Professional industrial control system interface featuring server cluster monitoring, real-time event logs, manual control panels, and KPI statistics. Dark grid background with orange accents creates a high-tech industrial atmosphere.
